com.github.shynixn.blockball.bukkit.logic.business.service

Class GameActionServiceImpl

  • com.github.shynixn.blockball.bukkit.logic.business.service.GameActionServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameActionService

    public class GameActionServiceImpl
implements GameActionService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameActionServiceImpl(NonExistentClass plugin, PluginProxy pluginProxy, GameHubGameActionService gameHubGameActionService, BossBarService bossBarService, ConfigurationService configurationService, GameHubGameActionService hubGameActionService, GameMiniGameActionService minigameActionService, GameBungeeCordGameActionService bungeeCordGameActionService, ScoreboardService scoreboardService, DependencyService dependencyService, DependencyBossBarApiService dependencyBossBarApiService, GameSoccerService gameSoccerService)
      Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeGame(Game game)
      Closes the given game and all underlying resources.
      void handle(Game game, int ticks)
      Handles the game actions per tick. ticks parameter shows the amount of ticks 0 - 20 for each second.
      <P> boolean joinGame(Game game, P player, Team team)
      Lets the given player leave join the given game. Optional can the prefered team be specified but the team can still change because of arena settings. Does nothing if the player is already in a Game.
      <P> void leaveGame(Game game, P player)
      Lets the given player leave the given game. Does nothing if the player is not in the game.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.business.service.GameActionService

        closeGame, handle, joinGame, leaveGame

    • Method Detail

      • joinGame

        public <P> boolean joinGame(Game game,
                            P player,
                            Team team)

        Lets the given player leave join the given game. Optional can the prefered team be specified but the team can still change because of arena settings. Does nothing if the player is already in a Game.

      • leaveGame

        public <P> void leaveGame(Game game,
                          P player)

        Lets the given player leave the given game. Does nothing if the player is not in the game.

      • closeGame

        public void closeGame(Game game)

        Closes the given game and all underlying resources.

      • handle

        public void handle(Game game,
                   int ticks)

        Handles the game actions per tick. ticks parameter shows the amount of ticks 0 - 20 for each second.
